metadata.synopsis: One-liner for refugees in the sewers, while getting shot at by Bhaal cultists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ensure you are in a deal with OrinLoad up CTY_Main_AGo to -20; 18; 789Click on |Refugee| - S_LOW_Refugee01 - b79264f9-cbd0-4cbc-a5de-6c33ed5c2c19

0.speaker: Refugee Sconnor
0.text: Stop - stop shooting! We haven't done anything!
0.context: NodeContext: cultists on the other side of the sewer are shooting at refugges. Cowering, yelling in fear and anger. Pinned down.

1.speaker: Refugee Sconnor
1.context: NodeContext: cultists on the other side of the sewer are shooting at refugges. Cowering, yelling in fear and anger. Pinned down.
